MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH45 postcode area of Peebles. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:50pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations in the area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:07am on 20th January
